key_risks: Economic sensitivity due to reliance on tourism and corporate event spending
Labor shortages and rising wage pressures in hospitality and event management
Regulatory scrutiny and potential antitrust actions due to market dominance
Competitive pressures from traditional and new market entrants
controversies: Monopoly concerns in the Banff/Jasper attraction market
Legal investigations by Competition Bureau Canada
Past legal disputes related to employment contracts and incentive plans
environmental_issues: Operations in ecologically sensitive areas drawing environmental scrutiny
Need for ongoing sustainability initiatives to mitigate environmental impact
social_issues: Labor market challenges, including shortages and wage pressures
Community impact of operations in national parks and tourist destinations
governance_issues: Legal disputes over management incentive plans

sources.title: Pursuit (company) - Wikipedia
sources.snippet: Pursuit Attractions and Hospitality, Inc. NYSE: PRSU (formerly Viad Corp) is an American attractions and hospitality company headquartered in Denver, Colorado.Pursuit owns and operates travel attractions and hotels in and around Banff, Denali, Glacier, Jasper, Kenai Fjords, and Waterton Lakes National Parks in Canada and the United States.
